name: PDFAnnotationChoiceWidget
desc: A PDFAnnotationChoiceWidget object provides user interactivity on a page of a PDF document, in the form of pop-up menus and lists.DeprecatedUse PDFAnnotationSubtype instead.

items.name: func stringValue() -> String!
items.desc: Returns the selection in the widget annotation.

items.name: func setStringValue(String!)
items.desc: Sets the selection in the widget annotation.

items.name: func backgroundColor() -> NSColor!
items.desc: Returns the color of the widget annotation background.

items.name: func setBackgroundColor(NSColor!)
items.desc: Sets the background color of the widget annotation.

items.name: func font() -> NSFont!
items.desc: Returns the font used to display the text in the widget annotation.

items.name: func setFont(NSFont!)
items.desc: Sets the font used to display the text in the widget annotation.

items.name: func fontColor() -> NSColor!
items.desc: Returns the font color used to display the text in the widget annotation.

items.name: func setFontColor(NSColor!)
items.desc: Sets the font color used to display the text in the widget annotation.

items.name: func fieldName() -> String!
items.desc: Returns the internal field name associated with the widget annotation.

items.name: func setFieldName(String!)
items.desc: Sets the internal field name associated with the widget annotationâ€™s value.

items.name: func isListChoice() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the widget annotation is a list.

items.name: func setIsListChoice(Bool)
items.desc: Sets whether the widget annotation is a list.

items.name: func choices() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns an array of strings that represent the items available in the list or pop-up menu of the choice widget annotation.

items.name: func setChoices([Any]!)
items.desc: Sets the items available in the list or pop-up menu of the choice widget annotation.
